title: Episode 358: Gerard John Schaefer "The Hangman"
description:
Alaina is back and scarier than ever, like seriously hold the scary spice, lady. Today she brings us the case of Gerard John Schaefer who killed an estimated 34 young women. He used his power and one time status as a police officer to lure these young girls into “going away” with him on some kind of great adventure but would then bring them into the woods and do some of the the most unimaginable and depraved things before brutally murdering them. Unfortunately many of his victims have yet to be found.

Check out these great sources!

American Ripper by Patrick Kendrick

Most Notorious Episode 193 with Patrick Kendrick
